mapper.select: select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.contents as contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.hit as hit, a.group_no as groupNo, a.order_no as orderNo, a.depth as depth, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.group_no desc, a.order_no asc
